reviews.review_msg: gorgeous. wanna wrap myself up in his arms. je t'aime m. bouchard!!

The best course I have taken in the criminology side of my degree, I would 100% take another hybrid course or TA for her. Lectures/discussions were great. Greer listens to students' needs and accommodates everyone. Exams were a breeze because of the materials online and we discuss them in class the next week. The paper was fun to write too! 10/10!!

A true queen. Super supportive and was willing to adjust the course due to zoom university. Overall 20/10 would recommend a course with Dr. Greer any day and I highly recommend a drug policy course with the queen herself since she is super knowledgeable and it's one of the few courses in my undergraduate that I actually learned something....
Great prof, interesting lectures. very helpful. study his notes for exam, no txt book needed.

Designed a special topics course himself about radicalization and extremism that was very interesting. The assignments (a media analysis paper looked at messages in a movie, extremist profile paper analyzed an online forum, proposed countering violent extremist program) were all awesome. Fair marker, good assignment outlines. Would take again!!
